includedAssets.title: The Silencer
includedAssets.synopsis: The smart-thinking US crime drama begins its eighth season and there's change afoot as Jeanne Tripplehorn (Big Love) joins the Behavioural Analysis Unit.

includedAssets.title: The Pact
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU get inside the head of a murderer who struck in different cities within a matter of hours and find a cryptic connection between the victims.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The BAU get inside the head of a murderer who struck in different cities within a matter of hours and find a cryptic connection between the victims.

includedAssets.title: Through the Looking Glass
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep3 - Through the Looking Glass
includedAssets.synopsis: The FBI profilers race against time to save a family trapped in a real life house of horrors and stop the perpetrator before he strikes again.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The FBI profilers race against time to save a family trapped in a real life house of horrors and stop the perpetrator before he strikes again.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The FBI profilers race against time to save a family trapped in a real life house of horrors and stop the perpetrator before he strikes again.

includedAssets.title: God Complex
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU head to New Mexico to investigate the chilling case of a killer suspected of selling body parts on the black market.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The BAU head to New Mexico to investigate the chilling case of a killer suspected of selling body parts on the black market.

includedAssets.title: The Good Earth
includedAssets.synopsis: Anne Dudek (House) and Rebecca Wisocky (The Mentalist) guest star as the BAU investigate four men missing in rural Oregon.

includedAssets.title: The Apprenticeship
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU study a serial killer with growing confidence and fear his next spree will be the biggest yet. Reid takes up a surprising new hobby.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The BAU study a serial killer with growing confidence and fear his next spree will be the biggest yet. Reid takes up a surprising new hobby.

includedAssets.title: The Fallen
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU head to Santa Monica, where a string of burnt bodies are found around the landmark pier. Rossi is reunited with his former marine sergeant.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The BAU head to Santa Monica, where a string of burnt bodies are found around the landmark pier. Rossi is reunited with his former marine sergeant.

includedAssets.title: The Wheels On The Bus...
includedAssets.altTitle: S8, Ep8 - The Wheels On The Bus...
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU deal with one of their most elaborate abductions yet when a school bus of teenagers vanishes into thin air during a routine journey.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The BAU deal with one of their most elaborate abductions yet when a school bus of teenagers vanishes into thin air during a routine journey.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The BAU deal with one of their most elaborate abductions yet when a school bus of teenagers vanishes into thin air during a routine journey.

includedAssets.title: Magnificent Light
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU try to piece together a gruesome jigsaw when two bodies are discovered in Seattle. Also, Penelope is perplexed when Derek snubs an old friend.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The BAU try to piece together a gruesome jigsaw when two bodies are discovered in Seattle. Also, Penelope is perplexed when Derek snubs an old friend.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The BAU try to piece together a gruesome jigsaw when two bodies are discovered in Seattle. Also, Penelope is perplexed when Derek snubs an old friend.

includedAssets.title: The Lesson
includedAssets.synopsis: The time for Reid to meet his mystery woman arrives, but the BAU's current case involving a string of peculiar abductions makes him fearful for her safety.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: It's time for Reid to meet his mystery woman, but the BAU's current case involving peculiar abductions makes him fearful for her safety.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The time for Reid to meet his mystery woman arrives, but the BAU's current case involving a string of peculiar abductions makes him fearful for her safety.

includedAssets.title: Perennials
includedAssets.synopsis: The FBI profilers race to the Deep South when two people are targeted by a killer imitating the methods of a murderer active over 30 years ago.

includedAssets.title: Zugzwang
includedAssets.synopsis: Reid's interest in his mystery woman is truly put to the test when she becomes the subject of his investigation.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Reid's interest in his mystery woman is truly put to the test when she becomes the subject of his investigation.

includedAssets.title: Magnum Opus
includedAssets.synopsis: While hunting a bloodthirsty 'vampire' in San Francisco, the BAU feel the absence of Reid, who is struggling to come to terms with his girlfriend's accident.

includedAssets.title: All That Remains
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU travel to Maryland when a father's 911 call raises a red flag. As the facts of the case emerge, they wonder if he's a victim or a suspect.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The BAU travel to Maryland when a father's 911 call raises a red flag. As the facts of the case emerge, they wonder if he's a victim or a suspect.

includedAssets.title: Broken
includedAssets.synopsis: The party's over for three young adults who were abducted from separate gatherings before being murdered. The BAU dig deeper and discover a secret.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The party's over for three young adults who were abducted from separate gatherings before being murdered. The BAU dig deeper and discover a secret.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The party's over for three young adults who were abducted from separate gatherings before being murdered. The BAU dig deeper and discover a secret.

includedAssets.title: Carbon Copy
includedAssets.synopsis: Scott Grimes (ER's Dr Archie Morris) guest stars in a chilling instalment that brings the BAU a step closer to unmasking the 'The Replicator'.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Scott Grimes (ER's Dr Archie Morris) guest stars in a chilling instalment that brings the BAU a step closer to unmasking the 'The Replicator'.

includedAssets.title: The Gathering
includedAssets.synopsis: Life appears to be imitating art when members of an online writing forum wind up dead. Also, the BAU fear they haven't seen the last of their stalker.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Life appears to be imitating art when members of an online writing forum wind up dead. Also, the BAU fear they haven't seen the last of their stalker.

includedAssets.title: Restoration
includedAssets.synopsis: Three murders in Chicago bring back bad memories for Morgan of his abusive childhood, but is the man who attacked him behind these killings?

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Three murders in Chicago bring back bad memories for Morgan of his abusive childhood, but is the man who attacked him behind these killings?

includedAssets.title: Pay It Forward
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU fly to Colorado when the locals receive a blast from the past and find a rotting skull inside a time capsule buried 25 years ago.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The BAU fly to Colorado when the locals receive a blast from the past and find a rotting skull inside a time capsule buried 25 years ago.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The BAU fly to Colorado when the locals receive a blast from the past and find a rotting skull inside a time capsule buried 25 years ago.

includedAssets.title: Alchemy
includedAssets.synopsis: Something's afoot in Rapid City when the BAU find ritualistic marks on bodies dumped on an American Indian reservation. Reid also gives the team cause for concern.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Something's afoot in Rapid City when the BAU find ritualistic marks on bodies dumped on an American Indian reservation.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Something's afoot in Rapid City when the BAU find ritualistic marks on bodies dumped on an American Indian reservation. Reid also gives the team cause for concern.

includedAssets.title: Nanny Dearest
includedAssets.synopsis: The BAU investigate a murderer who strikes on the same date every year. As the dreaded anniversary nears, the agents race to prevent another death.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The BAU investigate a murderer who strikes on the same date every year. As the dreaded anniversary nears, the agents race to prevent another death.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The BAU investigate a murderer who strikes on the same date every year. As the dreaded anniversary nears, the agents race to prevent another death.

includedAssets.synopsis: Couples who vowed 'till death do us part' are put to the test by a killer who forces husbands and wives to stab each other. Alex also suffers marital strife at home.

includedAssets.title: Brothers Hotchner
includedAssets.synopsis: Luke Skywalker himself, Mark Hamill, guest stars in the penultimate episode reuniting the BAU with The Replicator and Hotch's estranged brother.

includedAssets.title: The Replicator
includedAssets.synopsis: Star Wars icon Mark Hamill and Mad Men actor Mark Moses star in a bone-rattling showdown between the BAU and The Replicator in the season finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 8
includedAssets.synopsis: Things get personal for the BAU when the team are forced to take on a killer who recreates their past cases. Pulsating crime drama starring Joe Mantegna, Matthew Gray Gubler, Shemar Moore, A.J. Cook, Jeanne Tripplehorn and Thomas Gibson.

includedIn.title: Criminal Minds
includedIn.synopsis: The FBI’s Behavioural Analysis Unit, an elite group of psychological profilers, travel the country aiding local law enforcement by getting inside the heads of murder suspects.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: The FBI’s Behavioural Analysis Unit, a team of elite psychological profilers, travel America aiding local police by getting inside suspects’ heads.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: The FBI’s Behavioural Analysis Unit, an elite group of psychological profilers, travel the country aiding local law enforcement by getting inside the heads of murder suspects.
